properties.tree_description: 34” Water Oak, growing in limited rooting space with the canopy in conflict with utility linesReason for Removal:OtherComments:This oak poses a potential whole  tree failure hazard due to an imbalanced root system. Failure will be toward the street and overhead utility lines.
